meanings.sent1: The fluffy puppy had the doggiest tail wag.
meanings.sent2: She wore the doggiest costume at the pet parade.
meanings.sent3: The doggiest hat made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty was as doggiest as a faithful hound.
meanings.sent5: The doggiest bark echoed through the park.

meanings.sent1: The doggiest toy was the most popular among the puppies.
meanings.sent2: Her doggiest friend always greeted her with a wagging tail.
meanings.sent3: The doggiest treat was saved for last.
meanings.sent4: The doggiest day of the year was the canine carnival.
meanings.sent5: The doggiest bed was the comfiest spot in the house.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a dog.
meanings.sent1: His doggiest behavior included chasing his own tail.
meanings.sent2: The doggiest park in town had a special area for pups to play.
meanings.sent3: The doggiest dance move made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as doggiest as a happy puppy.
meanings.sent5: The doggiest scent led them to the lost dog.
